attributes.action: Not abandon Afghan translators, their families to certain death by Taliban
attributes.additional_details: Because these people worked tirelessly, taking extremely risky positions to aid uk and USA troupes and have now been sent a letter from the home office telling them they are a security breach. It’s disgraceful beyond belief. They’ve been abandoned as cannon fodder
attributes.background: Allow translators and their families uk citizenship or at the very least refugee status

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594397

The Government has launched two schemes to relocate and resettle Afghans. You can find out more about these schemes on the Government's website:

Afghan Relocations and Assistance Policy: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/afghan-relocations-and-assistance-policy/afghan-relocations-and-assistance-policy-information-and-guidance

Afghan citizens’ resettlement scheme: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/afghan-citizens-resettlement-scheme
